example.name: war tactics
example.text: Israeli troops killed four Palestinians Tuesday as Israeli forces blockaded Palestinian towns and villages in reprisal for the killing of four Israelis.
example.arg: in reprisal for the killing of four Israelis

example.name: war
example.text: Today Israeli security forces closed the Palestinian airport and the Gaza Strip and blockaded a West Bank town.
